item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Xi has a plan for retaliating against Trump’s gamesmanship
2. Taiwan asks South Korea for help over Chinese ship after subsea cable damaged
3. Austrian chancellor resigns as efforts to exclude far right collapse
4. Healthcare turns to AI for medical note-taking ‘scribes’
5. Steep costs of Irish reunification deter Dublin despite tax windfall
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 5:10 PM UTC
